title: 'Virus-fighting' scientist gets magnets stuck in nose
description: The astrophysicist was trying to create a necklace which would stop people touching their faces.
content:
Image copyrightCourtesy of Daniel ReardonImage caption
 Daniel Reardon had to go to hospital to have the magnets removed
An Australian astrophysicist who hoped to create a device to help stop people catching the coronavirus has ended up in hospital - after … [+2107 chars]
